targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM $table

WHERE
    $timeFilter
    and sec_code = '$sec_code'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(date), 604800) * 604800) * 1000 as t,
    avgWeighted(close, volume) as price
FROM default.candles

WHERE
    date >= toDateTime(1520176154) AND date <= toDateTime(1636038554)
    and sec_code = 'MAGN'
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'CAPEX'), value, NULL)) as CAPEX,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'EBITDA'), value, NULL)) as EBITDA,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Revenue'), value, NULL)) as Revenue
from $table
group by quarter_name, $dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'CAPEX'), value, NULL)) as CAPEX,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'EBITDA'), value, NULL)) as EBITDA,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Revenue'), value, NULL)) as Revenue
from default.financial_highlights
group by quarter_name, quarter
order by quarter

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Free-cash flow (FCF)'), value, NULL)) as FCF,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Dividends paid'), value, NULL)) as Dividends
from $table
group by quarter_name,$dateCol
order by $dateCol
targets.rawQuery:
select quarter_name,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Free-cash flow (FCF)'), value, NULL)) as FCF,
       last_value(multiIf(equals(indicator,'Dividends paid'), value, NULL)) as Dividends
from default.financial_highlights
group by quarter_name,quarter
order by quarter

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(value) as "EBITDA per tonne"
FROM $table
c
WHERE indicator == 'EBITDA per tonne* (USD/t)'

GROUP BY q

ORDER BY q
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as "EBITDA per tonne"
FROM default.financial_ratios
c
WHERE indicator == 'EBITDA per tonne* (USD/t)'

GROUP BY q

ORDER BY q

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(value) as "Slab cash-cost"
FROM $table
WHERE indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_Slab)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(value) as "Slab cash-cost"
FROM default.financial_ratios
WHERE indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 447.9)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $dateCol as q,
    last_value(price) as ConsolidateWeightedAverage
FROM $table
WHERE product == 'Sales of finished products, including:'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_PriceAverage)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(price) as ConsolidateWeightedAverage
FROM default.consolidated_prices_for_products
WHERE product == 'Sales of finished products, including:'
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 916)

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , $forecast_IronSlab)
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT q, sum(perc) as IronSlab FROM (
SELECT
    quarter as q,
    last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value)*last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
       LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
           financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
        and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
   and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
GROUP BY q, structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
UNION ALL (SELECT toDate(toStartOfQuarter(date_add(month, 1, now()))) as q , 244)

panels.title: Корреляция индекса ЖРС и железной части кеш-кост сляба

list.definition:
SELECT floor(sum(perc)+$forecast_IronSlab,1) as Slab
FROM (
      SELECT last_value(quarter) as q,
             last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value) * last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
      FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
               LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
              financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
              and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
      WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
        and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
      GROUP BY structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
list.name: forecast_Slab
list.query:
SELECT floor(sum(perc)+$forecast_IronSlab,1) as Slab
FROM (
      SELECT last_value(quarter) as q,
             last_value(slab_cash_cost_structure.value) * last_value(financial_ratios.value) as perc
      FROM slab_cash_cost_structure
               LEFT JOIN financial_ratios ON
              financial_ratios.quarter == slab_cash_cost_structure.quarter
              and financial_ratios.sec_code == slab_cash_cost_structure.sec_code
      WHERE (structure == 'Pellets'
   or structure == 'Iron ore & concentrate'
   or structure == 'Metal scrap')
        and indicator == 'Slab Cash cost (USD/t)'
      GROUP BY structure)
GROUP BY q
ORDER BY q
